name: Piotr Hofman
content: Piotr Hofman's homepage, I'm a researcher. Piotrek Hofman's homepage Current Position I'm an assistant professor (pol. adiunkt) at the Institute of Informatics, Faculty of Mathematics, Informatics and Mechanics of the University of Warsaw. List of my publications 2008 A Few New Facts about the EKG Sequence work with Marcin Pilipczuk 2010 Relating timed and register automata work with SÅawomir Lasota and Diego Figueira 2011 Decidability of branching bisimulation on normed commutative context-free processes work with SÅawomir Lasota and Wojciech CzerwiÅski 2012 Reachability problems for Multistack Stateless	Automata work with SÅawomir Lasota and Wojciech CzerwiÅski Approximating Weak Bisimilarity of Basic Parallel Processes work with Patrick Totzke 2013 Decidability of Weak Simulation on One-counter Nets work with Richard Mayr and Patrick Totzke Simulation Over One-counter Nets is PSPACE-Complete work with SÅawomir Lasota, Richard Mayr and	Patrick Totzke 2014 Synthesizing transformations from XML schema mappings work with Claire David, Filip Murlak and MichaÅ Pilipczuk Infinite-State Energy Games work with Parosh Aziz Abdulla, Mohamed Faouzi Atig, Richard Mayr, K. Parikh's theorem for infinite alphabets work with Marta Juzepczuk, Slawomir Lasota, and Mohnish Pattathurajan A lower bound for the coverability problem in acyclic pushdown VAS work with Matthias Englert, Slawomir Lasota, Ranko Lazic, JÃ©rÃ´me Leroux, and Juliusz Straszynski 2022 Solvability of orbit-finite systems of linear equations. work with Arka Ghosh and Slawomir Lasota. PHD thesis PHD Thesis in 2014, University of Warsaw Former Positions I completed my PhD studies at the University of Warsaw under supervision of dr hab. SÅawomir Lasota. From November 2013 to September 2014 I was a postdoc at University of Bayreuth in the group of Prof. Dr. Wim Martens. Since October 2014 to September 2016 I was a member of a Dr. Stefan GÃ¶ller group at LSV de Cachan. Current topics: One counter nets, Petri Nets with data, Equations with data, Unambiguous vass.
